name: Slab Connection puzzle
author: Alucard648
info: Connect slabs with matching shapes to solve.
description: You are given some slabs with various shapes. The goal is to connect them so shapes match each other. Slabs can connect anywhere.
setup:
Requires StackPushBlocks EX

1. Set up tiles as shown in screen shot #2. Slab parts can be any shape, but they should form 1*2 or 2*1 image when matched.
2. Make solid combos with all opaque parts of slabs, in order of shapes. You should end up with 32 combos, as shown in screenshot #3 and set up in demo quest.
3. Import and compile the script. It requires StackPushBlocks EX, in addition to default libraries.
4. Place matching pairs of blocks anywhere in the screen. Flag them as pushable. Don`t use inherent flags.
5. Set up StackPushBlocks EX, as usual.
6. Place invisible FFC anywhere in the screen with script attached.
 D0 - ID of 1st combo from step 2.
 D1 - Top left tile from setup in step 1.
